original_text: And the remainder thereof shall Aaron and his sons eat: with unleavened bread shall it be eaten in the holy place; in the court of the tabernacle of the congregation they shall eat it.
korean_text: 그 나머지는 아론과 그의 자손이 먹되 누룩을 넣지 말고 거룩한 곳 회막 뜰에서 먹을지니라

sentences.original_text: And the remainder thereof shall Aaron and his sons eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그 남은 것은 아론과 그의 아들들이 먹을 것이니

sentences.original_text: with unleavened bread shall it be eaten
sentences.korean_translation: 누룩 없는 빵과 함께 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: in the court of the tabernacle of the congregation
